description: It has a really nice, clean interface. It has some problems, though. It starts up slowly, and I cannot view or change the translations in preferences.
summary: Great app, but has some bugs

description: Works well on the PinePhone / Mobian. Well aligned. One language, English. Ability to import own translation in the settings but did not try it.
For me it isn't integrating with adwaita-dark theme and uses default adwaita. Still good software, thank you.

This app is the only Bible app I could find on
Discover for my Pinephone. I can't seem to 
check the prefrences to change the translation,
but it works for Plasma Mobile and that's all I
can really ask for at this point. Thanks for
making this!
summary: A Bible app that works for mobile Linux!
